job.title: Software Engineer I
job.description:
You go all in no matter what you do, and so do we. You want to use your powers for good, and that’s exactly what we do at Lytx®. Our team is made up of hungry, humble, and capable people who are making a difference every day with technology that helps save lives each year.
We are seeking a Software Engineer to help accelerate our industry leading Driver Safety/Fleet Management Programs. Our products manage massive amounts of data collected from over 700,000 vehicles worldwide. We use the data and video to derive intelligent insights using Machine Vision and AI. We also track real time telematics for all devices on the network.
___________
Lytx is powered by cutting-edge technology and Happy People. You want to use your powers for good, and that’s exactly what we do at Lytx. Our team is made up of hungry, humble, and capable people who are making a difference every day with technology that helps save lives each year.
